hotels.title: Luxurious Berkshire Palace Haven 50-Minutes from London with Pools, Spa & Award-Winning Dining
hotels.description: Live like royalty, just an hour out of London, at this historic estate in the heart of Berkshire. This opulent retreat, once home to dukes, earls, and even a prince, offers only the best of the best across its lavishly furnished rooms and manicured gardens. Savour award-winning dining at The Astor Grill, enjoy traditional afternoon tea in a grand dining room, or explore the estate's 376 acres of stunning woodland and gardens. For a touch of rejuvination, visit the palace's spa for a luxurious treatment or enjoy a dip in the sparkling pool, before retiring to the lush Library Bar for a well-earned tipple.
